statements.chinese: 我(已经)是一名老师五年了
statements.english: I have been a teacher for five years

statements.chinese: 我自从2019年(已经)是一名老师了
statements.english: I have been a teacher since 2019

statements.chinese: 他(已经)是一名医生15年了
statements.english: he has been a doctor for 15 years
he has been sick for a week
they have been married for 10 years

statements.chinese: 他们自从幼儿园(已经)是朋友了
statements.english: they have been friends since kindergarten

statements.chinese: 我们自从童年(已经)是朋友了
statements.english: we have been friends since childhood

statements.chinese: 自从我们搬家到这个街区
statements.english: since we moved to this neighborhood

statements.chinese: 自从我们两个都搬家到这个街区
statements.english: since we both moved to this neighborhood

statements.chinese: 我们(已经)是邻居了自从我们两个都搬家到这个街区
statements.english: we have been neighbors since we both moved to this neighborhood
I have been to that place

statements.chinese: 我(还没有)去过那个地方
statements.english: I haven't been to that place

statements.chinese: 我从来没有去过那个地方
statements.english: I have never been to that place
I have been to that place

statements.chinese: 我(已经)去过中国的长城
statements.english: I have been to the Great Wall of China

statements.chinese: 我从来没有去过中国的长城
statements.english: I have never been to the Great Wall of China

statements.chinese: 我(已经)去过迪士尼乐园
我(已经)去过在加州的迪士尼乐园
statements.english: I have been to Disneyland in California

statements.chinese: 我从来没有去过在加州的迪士尼乐园
statements.english: I have never been to Disneyland in California
I have been to Japan twice
I have never been to Japan

statements.chinese: 我从来没有去过加拿大
statements.english: I have never been to Canada

statements.chinese: 你从来没有去过加拿大
statements.english: you have never been to Canada

statements.chinese: 你从来没有去过加拿大吗？
statements.english: have you never been to Canada

statements.chinese: 你以前从来没有去过加拿大吗
statements.english: have you never been to Canada before

statements.chinese: 你以前曾经去过加拿大吗
statements.english: have you ever been to Canada before
have you ever been to Canada
have you ever been to that store

statements.chinese: 你曾经去过那家餐厅吗？
statements.english: have you ever been to that restaurant

statements.chinese: 你曾经参加过一个现场的音乐会吗？
statements.english: have you ever attended a live concert

statements.chinese: 你曾经丢过你的钱包吗？
statements.english: have you ever lost your wallet

statements.chinese: 你曾经见过一个彩虹吗？
statements.english: have you ever seen a rainbow
have you ever made a snowman
have you ever been to Canada
